title: LF players: Ex-EU LCS and OPL coach building competitive teams

embed.description: Ex-EU LCS and OPL coach looking for committed players to form competitive League of Legends teams for Oceanic amateur play. You will be expected to play a minimum of 10 solo/duo games per week in addition to 3 weekly training sessions and tournaments. All ranks may apply.

body:
Ex-EU LCS and OPL coach looking for committed players to form competitive League of Legends teams for Oceanic amateur play. You will be expected to play a minimum of 10 solo/duo games per week in addition to 3 weekly training sessions and tournaments. All ranks may apply. If you have been selected to trial we will contact you.

https://forms.gle/zQL8PgYkfdRvhPMD7
